name: citadel-websocket-client
description: TypeScript WebSocket and WASM client for Citadel Internal Service

scripts.build-wasm: cd ../citadel-internal-service-wasm-client && wasm-pack build --target web && cp -r pkg/* ../typescript-client/
scripts.dev: npm run generate-types && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.dev-wasm: npm run build-wasm && npm run build && npm run test-wasm
scripts.setup-wasm: npm install && npm run build-wasm && npm run generate-types
